title: Moto G22 now official with Android 12 and MediaTek Helio G37
content:
Motorola releases far too many phones for anyone to reasonably keep track of, including several new Moto G models over the past few months. The Moto G22 has been extensively leaked already, but now the phone has been officially announced by Motorola. This appears to be fairly similar to the latest Moto G Power, which

The post Moto G22 now official with Android 12 and MediaTek Helio G37 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Motorola has officially revealed the Moto G22, yet another budget phone in the Moto G series, with Android 12 and a MediaTek Helio G37 chip.
